name: oscerd-java
description:
The Java module installs Oracle JDK or JRE on your node.
The module make possible to set the Java family, the Java update version, the architecture, the operating system, 
the temporary folder where the package will be extracted and many other features. Take a look at the documentation to know more.
author: Oscerd
summary: The Java module installs Oracle JDK or JRE on your node.
